meanings.definition: Having a star-like shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The stellated snowflakes sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The night sky was filled with stellated constellations.
meanings.sent3: The stellated cookies were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her stellated earrings shone brighter than the rest.
meanings.sent5: The stellated flower petals glistened with morning dew.

meanings.definition: To decorate or adorn with stars or star-like shapes.
meanings.sent1: She stellated the ceiling with glow-in-the-dark stars.
meanings.sent2: The artist stellated the stage for the performance.
meanings.sent3: He stellated the cake with edible gold stars.
meanings.sent4: The designer stellated the dress with sequins.
meanings.sent5: They stellated the room with twinkling fairy lights.
